website_summaries.verdict: This eco-friendly slicer lets you cut wide loaves and even adjusts to make slices thicker or thinner.
pros: Allows you to cut different slice thicknesses
cons: Not as useful for narrow loaves

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Product
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this bread slicer. It is large and very sturdy which is just what I needed. I recently updated my bread maker and my loaves are much larger than with my previous bread maker. My old slicer was a pain to use and flimsy in comparison to this lovely unit. It folds up so I stand it next to my bread maker on one of my counters. I especially enjoy the crumb catcher, no mess anymore! This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Works as indicated, easy to store and well made. It could be a bit smaller in order accommodate smaller loaves of bread and the place holder doesn't hold up the side so they slip inward when cutting bread if the loaf is smaller than the size of the area. Perhaps if there were a way to adjust the sides to each loaf it would be a better product and keep the sides from caving in when cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Dori Estes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this slicer!!! The sides are spring loaded, so you flip the sides to the other side and they snap into place. It’s big enough to fit my 2lb loaf with room to spare and my bread knife doesn’t do damage to it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, just not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I would say that this gets the job done but I bet there are cheaper and better solutions. I like that it folds and that it has different thicknesses but I still find it hard to slice bread from my bread machine and I think even the thinnest slice is still too thick. I feel like the price was jacked up on this due to the popularity of the pandemic as the website for seller has it listed $10 cheaper but conveniently says it’s “out of stock”. I’d say shop around unless you are desperate like I was.
customer_reviews.author: M Valero

customer_reviews.title: A bit too wide and bulky
customer_reviews.text: I know I only gave it three stars, which would suggest that this was only "OK". I actually really like this bread slicer, and I do use it quite often. It is super sturdy, easy to clean and folds up really easily. My complaints are relatively minor and probably won't bother everyone - but here we go. 1. It is too wide. None of my bread knives can reach from one side to the other. I wish the width was adjustable. 2. While it folds up flat, the end piece is loose. I wish it fit into the folded bundle somehow to keep it all together.
customer_reviews.author: MSMaine

customer_reviews.title: Will not give you uniformly sized slices.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this product is sturdy...but please dont mistake that for being synonymous with "well made." I imagine that anyone reading this/ looking at this bread slicer as opposed to simply slicing a loaf is because you want clean, uniform, identical slices. You will not EASILY achieve that goal with this slicer. Reason being, the slots where your bread knife is intended to be inserted do not line up with the slots on the opposite side. Nor are these slots uniform in size or spacing.
customer_reviews.author: Lilmissdreamer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as described
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived within 2 days. I was excited to use this Bamboo Bread Slicer. However, I was disappointed upon opening the box. There were layers of plastic wrap, but there was no instruction booklet. The only instructions provided were on the Amazon website. I have a nice electric knife and it did the work as I was trying to slice a loaf of bread. Now I am not able to fold this slicer for storage, and I am not able to slice the bread into thin slices either. I am returning this product. The only reason I am giving 2 stars is because it is made of bamboo (and not plastic).
customer_reviews.author: A Manian

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice; but it was impossible to get the bread to cut completely through. I even bought the suggested long bread knife. Net I tried to turn the loaf 1/4 after each cut, thinking I could just finish it out of the cutter, but it just fell apart into a mess! I had to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Don Popejoy

customer_reviews.title: HaRd to use
customer_reviews.text: While this is pretty amd well made, cutting home made, crusty bread is worse than cutting it on just a cutting board. It is missing something G to hold the bread in place and to guard fingers amd the slots are awkward to use with a long knife. I am replacing it with an electric slicer
customer_reviews.author: Monika Wertman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Bread Slicer
customer_reviews.text: I bought the "large" version of this slicer because I bake a lot of round loaves, and they won't fit the smaller ones. However, be advised, this "large" version requires you to use a long bread knife--like 11-12" long. A standard 8" bread knife won't really work with it. Not a problem, because I had a long knife, but it's something to consider. Otherwise, this is VERY nicely constructed, the guides lock into place with a solid and satisfying "snap", and the fact that it folds flat for storage is an added bonus. Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer23

customer_reviews.title: no more uneven slices
customer_reviews.text: We like thin toast, and homemade bread. Until we got this bread slicer it was difficult to cut slices with a consistent, even thickness. The slicing guides give you the option to cut from very thin to very, very thick. It also holds big loaves easily. The only change that I would make is to include a card in the packaging that explains how to unfold the slicing guide, it’s not real obvious, had to go back and look at the photo online and then played around a bit before having the Ah Ha! moment.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Schalk

customer_reviews.title: Takes up little space, is an excellent help to a baker
customer_reviews.text: The fact that you can fold this up when it's not in use is absolutely ideal. It's also great that it's possible to decide whether you want to cut a thin slice of bread or a thicker one. I have another bread cutter; it's going to a charity shop!
customer_reviews.author: Cochise

customer_reviews.title: This is my first bread slicer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bread slicer, so I dont know if all of them have these issues but here's how I fell about it. It's very sturdy and easy to use, and it helps me cut thin bread slices. However, it bulky and hard to store, and I've already scratched it alot with my bread knife. It's also hard to clean between the slats.
customer_reviews.author: Val Boat

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is, there's got to be a better way. No instructions come with it. Better than nothing is the only positive thing I can say about it.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Mother's Love This
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my mom for her birthday. She loves making bread and this Bread Slicer helps her with cutting bread into equal pleasant slices. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish this would have been adjustable guide. It's an 11 inch unit and now I know that the longest knife I have is 9 in. It didn't occur to me that this would be a problem. Overall, I like the idea of this bread guide. It helps to get even slices of bread, but because my bread knife is not long enough it doesn't work well for me and I get weird uneven slices .. unless I buy a longer bread knife.
customer_reviews.author: BPeterson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't guide as well as it could.
customer_reviews.text: The guide doesn't allow for full slicing top to bottom. It's hard to have equal slices since you have to remove the bread from the guide and hope your slices stay equal in thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY--BROKE INSTANTLY!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to take this thing for a spin given that I have been slicing my bread by hand and I do a horrible job at it. Upon opening the box, setting it up, and taking the first cut, one entire bamboo side fell off. I tried to push the nails back in to seat it again to take another cut. Upon the second cut, the first side AND another side fell apart. COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY! Save your money and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: smashmama

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor materials.
customer_reviews.text: Came with no instructions. Splinters. You need to buy the longest bread knife possible. Even then it still splinters. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bread slicer. I made some monster loaves of bread and they still fit in, no problem. It is much heavier duty than I expected for the price and I am sure it will last me the rest of my life! I like that you can choose thick or thin slices. I’m surprised and delighted at the value I got.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth I

customer_reviews.title: Nice if you need a bread board
customer_reviews.text: I think it's handy but kinda a pain in the neck at the same time. The folding and unfolding scenario is cumbersome. It's a little wobbly to boot. I would rather have a small plastic one that cuts one slice at a time and throw in a drawer. This is just one more bulky thingy sitting on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Igolf4me

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit the bread loaf
customer_reviews.text: This bread slicer is too small, both in the width and height of the loaf. As a result when you go to slice the bread you end up cutting into the bread several inches before coming to the slicer guides. The concept of various thickness of bread is a bad idea, it makes you slice some of the bread and removing those slices and then put the loaf back in to slice the rest. In my option just slice the loaf freehand is better than this slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Very happy to find this wooden slicer...
customer_reviews.text: Recently started making our own bread for higher fiber content. Product made slicing much simpler. When I unpacked it I did pick up a small splinter on my finger. We scrubbed with a brush and seemed to eliminate the issue. No instructions came--folding and unfolding took a little figuring out but turned out pretty simple. However, was concerned at first of forcing the sides and breaking. Would be nice to have instructions included. Also needed a fairly long bread knife to extend thru both sides. Fortunately we had two sizes already. Overall very good product.
customer_reviews.author: EHelms

customer_reviews.title: Strong and well made Bread slicer!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bread slicer, you can even choose the size of the slices just by placing your knife in a different position. I would recommend one for all my friends who love homemade bread. Try some I am sure you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Iceman 762x51

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: but wish the slices were consistent, instead of varying between wide and narrow. Glad we purchased the narrow one as the larger size would have been unnecessarily wide for use with our bread-maker.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and great quality. Loaf space is quite large. I will be buying a longer bread knife as my electric knife blade isn’t long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Derrig-Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Have been looking for one for a long time. Great quality. When you first open box It does have an odor from the stain. Took about a week of airing out and is now fine.
customer_reviews.author: acg

customer_reviews.title: Good Bread Knife/Positioning
customer_reviews.text: W/o a good bread knife, you'll be frustrated. Else, works well if you keep the bread properly positioned -- you'll know what I mean when you use it. And it is in its way charming,
customer_reviews.author: Norman Metzger

customer_reviews.title: It works but...
customer_reviews.text: I find this slicer bulky. I had a good one, simpler, lighter, and less space-occupying to use but I gave it away and now I'm very sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: when i received my bread slicer it had come apart on one end of the bottom tray.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately when I received my bamboo bread slicer it was damaged. The bottom tray had come apart on one end. I am going to try and glue it back together. This was not a cheap piece of equipment I hope the glue works.
customer_reviews.author: donna summey

customer_reviews.title: INSTABILTY OF PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived and put together.the sides collapse and are not held firmly in place.This creates a cutting hazard,due to the instability of the side slots,one has to steady the slots and bread creating a very dangerous outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Louis J. Apuzzio

customer_reviews.title: Been Getting in Bread
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the fancy bread I have been getting lately.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Very wide
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that my long knife isn’t long enough. I have a 8 inch bread knife and it’s just too short. You need an extra long knife
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and it takes the danger out of slicing bread!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well build. We love the ability to vary the thickness of the slices. Folds up and Easy to store, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Not as impressed as others were with this....
customer_reviews.text: I found it cumbersome to fit the bread in the contraption and then cut the bread....I will keep trying different techniques but for now I am not impressed and do not think it was worth the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Bread slicer
customer_reviews.text: We have had several bread slices in the past but this particular one is excellent I highly recommend it to anyone who bakes homemade in the 0ven or bread machine.....
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Connelli

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work Well With Regular Size Loaves Of Bread/Standard Kitchen Knives
customer_reviews.text: I like the bamboo construction, the foldabilty for storage, but it is very difficult to slice bread due to the large size of this item, not having knives long enough to go thru both sides of slots, make me wish I had bought the smaller version, even though it is questionable whether my baked loaves of bread would have fit in the smaller version. I need to find another way to evenly slice a fresh loaf of bread.
customer_reviews.author: Frankly

customer_reviews.title: This was not developed by a person that slices bread.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not adjustable as advertised. A standard home baked loaf moves around while slicing is attempted. The sides are too far apart. The bottom shelf sheds bamboo fragments. Poorly engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Omerza

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to slice bread for even slices.
customer_reviews.text: I always had a difficult time trying to slice my homemade bread into even pieces. This makes it much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Janette Vogel

customer_reviews.title: good slicing guide
customer_reviews.text: I did have to buy a longer bread knife - as expected because I read the earlier reviews before purchasing. I honestly would prefer that there was only one thickness guide so you could cut the whole loaf without turning it around. That's my only reason for not giving 5 stars, and I realize that to other people having a choice of thickness is an advantage.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Burton

customer_reviews.title: Depth of slice
customer_reviews.text: The shape do the sliver doesn’t allow for a knife to go to the bottom of the load of bread, hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: Erin Strachan

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to assemble and break down. I thought the sides are what adjusted for different widths of bread but the length of the bread is what adjusts, so I was a bit disappointed with that. The only downside I have found so far is the slicing slots splinter easy when slicing the bread.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Easy to assemble and use. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Evenly sliced home made bread!
customer_reviews.text: Once I got it put together properly it worked fantastic! Those guides rotate both ways. Of course I had them going the wrong way and thought defect. I just cancelled my refund/return request.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Van Emmerik

customer_reviews.title: Think carefully if you really need this, and read other people's reviews as well.
customer_reviews.text: It looked very useful so I purchase with impulse for my home made loaf, but I just used it only one time and I don't use it these days. the distance beetween each portion is not even and the gap is too wide vs bread knife. I would return it if I didn't wash it as soon as I recieve it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The variance in the slice size....easy to use...easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Konczyk

customer_reviews.title: Need at least a ten inch blade on your bread knife.
customer_reviews.text: I make my own bread so this is an easy way to slice a loaf. Product is well made, just found I needed to get a bread knife with a ten inch long blade.
customer_reviews.author: mary crane

customer_reviews.title: It's so so
customer_reviews.text: Thickness of slats varies creating irregular bread slices. This can be overcome by compressing the bread at thinner slats and releasing at thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Joseph Frogel

customer_reviews.title: This came with no instructions-nothing in the box
customer_reviews.text: I would like to know if this can be washed. I damp wiped it, however, I will be making gluten-free bread and using this to slice it and it will need to be cleaned after it is used for wheat flour bread. I have not used it yet though.
customer_reviews.author: my2labs

customer_reviews.title: Easy bread slicer
customer_reviews.text: Love the different thickness options. It's lightweight, easy to clean and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Coots

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Easy to fold open and fold close. Has different sized slots for whatever thickness desired. Depending on the sharpness if your knife you can splinter the bamboo. Just stay in the center of the groove while slicing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There were no instructions on how to use it.
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions to use it and I tried my best . Couldn’t get it to cut through the bottom of the bread and had a hard time adjusting it to hold the bread. Sorry it was pretty but pretty isn’t everything,so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Super useful
customer_reviews.text: Great device to make even slices. Can even be used for bagels!
customer_reviews.author: sqb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo is quality. It is sturdy and holds the bread nicely. You just can cut all the way through the slice. You have to take it out to finish up.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Starr

customer_reviews.title: need an extra long knife
customer_reviews.text: It folds so good for saving space in a cabinet. It is a great guide to cutting more even slices but takes practice.
customer_reviews.author: Claudette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slices
customer_reviews.text: So easy to get perfect slices with my electric knife.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Alice Reed

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart Quickly
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo on the crumb tray came apart after 3 uses. It looks like the staples are not big enough to keep the wood from breaking. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Item very nice, and meets my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Just got and have only used a couple of times, but it is as described. And now my bread is sliced evenly. Just pay attention to the different sizes wh eww n slicing.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Plumb

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really find this product easy to use, and I love that you can adjust the thickness of the slices
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Herlihy

customer_reviews.title: Learning curve?
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a longer knife to be able to slice through the bread. The knife arrived today and I found that it shears into the bamboo.....not especially happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: CHH

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The product didn't allow the knife to cut down to the bottom of the loaf and was cumbersome to use. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is Fragile.
customer_reviews.text: It is too delicate for heavy use; but its too pretty to cast aside! Use gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product be cause it is most stable than all these plastic ones. I can slice fresh bread with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Boyles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bread slicer for homemade bread
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and size of this and its perfect for homemade bread. Stores ad cleans very easily too!

customer_reviews.title: Great bread slicer
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Makes it easy to slice home made bread

customer_reviews.title: Bread slicer fell apart
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it it fell apart. I am sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Margie Avey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint is that we wish all the slots were the same.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.text: It fell apart as soon as it came out of the box. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy easy to put together and then lay flat, and easy to store.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to cut large loaves of homemade rye bread and it fits in.
customer_reviews.author: I.Trahan

customer_reviews.title: Every happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: It's doing a good job so far. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen B

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design but sides wobble to much to a clean slice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get a longer knife
customer_reviews.text: It works great only thing did notice is you need a very long knife to use both sides if the guide I used an electric knife it used everybit of the blade to stay in the guides But it seemed to be good looked great
customer_reviews.author: Maddtrucker69

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice rig - only complaint is that my 9" bread knife is to short. Need a minimum of 12" for a smoother cutting experience. Well made and am not having any 'wood shaving' issues. Easy to set up and once collapsed, it stores easily on a shelf where you can even put something on top of it (hate things that suck up all the space around them - there is only so much storage space anymore). Happy with the purchase and a 14" bread knife is on site for only $7 with no 1 or 2 star ratings - woot!!
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This slicer is more challenging to use than cutting by hand without a guide. The material is of poor quality, my bread knife ended up cutting into the guide posts and the bread was torn up. It is so wide that a standard bread knife can't reach to the other side to ensure a straight cut. Overall, I am very unsatisfied with this product and I would not recommend it to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaD

customer_reviews.title: GREAT IF YOU LIKE WOOD IN YOUR BREAD....EXTRA FIBER??
customer_reviews.text: Why oh why didn’t I believe the bad reviews??? While this is a nice wooden piece it is nearly worthless to cut a large loaf of fresh bread. Yep, you end up with wood splinters and shavings when you slice bread...YUK... This goes in the next garage sale with an ‘as is’ sign....total waste of my money...DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT OR ANY LIKE IT....THEY DON’T WORK.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Slice thicknesses are a bit confusing
customer_reviews.text: I bake my own bread, plain & rustic. This bamboo slicer is good. It collapses easily & compactly which makes it easy to store in a cabinet. I believe it is supposed to have three slicing thicknesses but it is difficult for me to determine where one thickness stops & the next one starts. It would be good if the manufacturer could mark this on the vertical blade guides. Presently it is not that obvious since the slice thickness differences are so slight.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth Waiting For!
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky enough to get one of these before they became "unavailable" and it took awhile to get here, but it was well worth waiting for. It is quite an ingenious design, works wonderfully, and to store I fold up and put it with my cookbooks. You will need a longer knife. I subsequently purchased a knife with a 12" blade and it's perfect. Whoever designed this – thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JaBul

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Bread Slicer
customer_reviews.text: I find it fun and easy to use by keeping all slices the same size. At first I had a problem finding out how to set it up and flatten it out to store. Once I did finally figure it out I found it so simple, dah! My grandson saw it the other day and expressed he would like one, so with Birthday coming up he is getting one with my help if he needs it. Ha! Yes, I am pleased with it and consider it a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: V.Moeller

customer_reviews.title: No mess and perfect slices! Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I lived without this thing! I used to cut loaves of bread just like another other common man: on the cutting board! With crumbs going everywhere & end result was misshapen, uneven slices of bread. No fun! This thing changes everything. Knife is held stead for perfect slices! Crumbs fall through the slots into the crumb catcher. End result is perfect slices and no mess! Game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Global Chillage

customer_reviews.title: Can't adjust for width of loaf
customer_reviews.text: I like the thought that went into this loaf holder. The spring loaded sides and tray to catch crumbs and ability to set length of loaf to be sliced. But it's a bit wide for the loaves that come out of my bread maker. They will wobble back and forth when I cut them in here. I wish there was a way to adjust for width of loaf too.
customer_reviews.author: Barry C. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and compact, but I'm concerned about durability
customer_reviews.text: I got this a few weeks ago and have made several loaves of bread since then, using this to cut them. It makes things so much easier! I also love how it folds up to a very compact size. I'm now able to cut the bread into equal slices that are much straighter than I was able to do without a guide. On the downside, I am already seeing a bit of wear from the knife scraping against it. I am hoping that this doesn't portend an early demise.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Torgersen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bread slicer. My first one was made of a plastic slotted unit with a wood base, and the plastic part cracked and became unusable after just a few months. This slicer is all wood and is more sturdy. It is wide, though, so I'd suggest buying a knife that has at least a 10 to 12 inch blade to reach all the way across the cutting slots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to buy this after reading some of the reviews, but I am so glad I did. I don't understand how anyone is having issues putting it together. The sides literally swing upward from how it is packaged, and lock into place. You can then pull them out, and swing them back down for storage. It is sturdy, and does not move when cutting bread inside this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this but it proved to be very flimsy in design. I waited a bit before reviewing because I wanted to form a complete opinion. The bottom is glued and comes apart at the most inconvenient times. The slicer isn't as sturdy as I hoped it would be. I loved the idea of being able to fold it down for storage. It is a very pretty item. I just wished it had been constructed to be more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie C.

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Even slices on a stable slicer!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Bamboo folding bread slicer. I've committed to making all of my household's daily bread and having this slicer makes it so much easier to stabilize the loaf and cut clean even slices. If I could make ANY change at all it would be to have more of the thicker slicing spaces but I've had no problem with this one at all!
customer_reviews.author: Gaila

customer_reviews.title: Just the thing
customer_reviews.text: I have a sourdough starter that I've been working with for about a year and a half. I've made rustic round loaves, hard rolls, hot dog & hamburger buns and recently started trying to make a more "like store bought" sandwich bread. First thing I learned: getting nice, even, slices of a reasonable thickness is a pain in the ass. Second thing I learned: a good bread knife and this bamboo slicer quickly eliminated that pain in the ass.
